transArray.content: I chose this hotel for a business trip and a temporary stay for one night. It was very good. It was very close to the subway. It was very convenient. The room was very clean.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. This location provides guests with great convenience in terms of food, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. Moreover, the hotel's enthusiastic staff will escort you during your trip. We With "the happy mood of the family" as our top priority, we touch everyone with the most considerate warmth. At the same time, we have always put hygiene first, and providing guests with a safe and comfortable stay is our continuous goal. All the staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Li Changxia
